caption.p: Typical MR imaging patterns of specific viral encephalitides

td.p: • Symmetric involvement of basal ganglia, thalami, cortex, or brain stem
• Symmetric confluent white matter lesions (periventricular, basal ganglia, centrum semiovale, brain stem, cerebellum),

tr.td: • Diffuse involvement of basal ganglia, thalami, periventricular white matter, brain stem, and hippocampi

td.p: • Rarely lesions in thalamus, cerebellum, caudate nucleus, and brain stem
• Confluent subcortical white matter lesions, predominantly in parieto-occipital lobes

tr.td: • Bilateral symmetric lesions in thalami, basal ganglia, and midbrain
• Posterior medulla oblongata and pons, dentate nuclei, and midbrain
